category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PertChart.MEProcess.Text
preference.preference_description: Defines the text to be displayed in the PERT node of type MEProcess. The format for a valid entry are several segments structured like this: <free-text>[property-name]. <free-text> is any text except square brackets ([ and ]). The text can be empty. Use the formula editor (Edit -> Options -> Manufacturing -> Pert tab) to edit the values of the preference. <property-name> is a valid property name for MEProcess object. It must be wrapped in square brackets, e.g. [object_name].
